entry.title: Today in DeFi - Polygon PoS Hardfork Live, Premia V3 Whitepaper, Yield Trading, and More...
entry.summary: Polygon PoS Hardfork Live Polygon has upgraded its PoS chain. The upgrade helps reduce the frequency and depth of reorgs, and improve transaction finality. Premia V3 Whitepaper Options protocol Premia releases the V3 whitepaper. V3 updates include a Concentrated liquidity AMM, Margin for sellers provided by lenders earning interest, Vaults for set-and-forget strategies, and the RFQ network to improve liquidity in less liquid options.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Fantom Gas Monetization, Celsius Owns Account Assets, Own and Earn on Bluechip NFTs, and More...
entry.summary: Fantom Voted For Gas Monetization Fantom governance passed the gas monetization proposal, in which Fantom will reduce the burn rate from 20% to 5%, and redirect the 15% to incentivize usage/transactions of Fantom dApps. Celsius Owns Account Assets The Judge of the Celsius bankruptcy case ruled that the funds deposited to Earn Accounts, which amount to $4.2 billion, are the property of Celsius, not the investors.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Synthetix Perps V2 Live, Waves USDN Resolution Plan, Delta-Neutral Strategies, and More...
entry.summary: Synthetix Perps V2 Live Synthetix launches perps v2 with frontends on Optimism. Perps V2 reduces perps fees by using an off-chain oracle system and minimizes risks for perps LPs with new risk management features. Waves USDN Resolution Plan Waves team released a resolution plan for its severely depegged stablecoin USDN, aiming to stabilize the peg with proposals including token backings, team donations, swap reactivation, incentives for reserve holders, and adaptive vesting for USDN holders.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Symbiosis V2, OpenOcean Swap Aggregator, IL-less DEX, and More...
entry.summary: Symbiosis V2 Cross-chain AMM Symbiosis launches V2, enabling a serving network (Boba BNB L2) and single-sided AMM pool, making it easier to support more chains and increasing pool efficiency. OpenOcean Cross-chain Swap OpenOcean launches 1-click cross-chain swap, supporting multiple chains with better swap rates and better UX by implementing Celer’s IM Framework.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - NEAR MetaMask Compatibility, Sturdy V1, Trading Perps on Solana, and More...
entry.summary: NEAR MetaMask Compatibility NEAR developer Proximity Labs releases NETH, a smart contract that allows users to directly interact with NEAR dApps using their Ethereum wallets, such as MetaMask. Sturdy V1 Live Lending protocol Sturdy releases a revamped UI for 1.0, including integrated information and historical yield graphs. Sturdy also expands into the ETH market and will allow users to deposit LSDs as collateral to borrow ETH.
